content: **knitted top in drops paris piece is knitted top down with ties i-cord and flounce size s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dancingdarlingtop drops design pattern w-934 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 58 powder pink **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
